node.text:
Ultimate comfort, calming sea views and the beauty of the day spilling in through your room window. This feeling of bliss and so much more awaits you when you stay at The Raviz Kovalam.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
